name: invenman
description: - We are using the inventory.js and product.js classes to hold information   - We can easily connect these to a data base if we wanted to  - Product.js is a component to show the individual Products  - Inventory.js is a component that contains all the Products  - Fm.js is a component that is a form that allows us to input new Products  - The UI is written with Ant Design for React
